Controls

Press Spacebar to Start

Use left arrow to move left

Use right arrow to move right

Press Escape key to pause

Press Space to unpause

Instructions

You are underwater and you must fight against a group of blood-thirsty whales. You only have 3 lives. Use the paddle to controll the ball and kill the whales before you run out of your lives. You gain 5 points for each whale killed. You lose a life when the ball falls off before reaching the paddle.

Good Luck!
